name: Adrift - Hyperspace
description:
This short text-based choose-your-own-adventure story is a mini project I used to learn some of the Twine engine. This is my first attempt at the engine and this is more of a milestone marker/proof of concept for myself than as an actual paid product. 

It was an enjoyable exercise that I managed to make from start to finish in about 3 hours. I look forward to using Twine more in the future for more C.Y.O.A. stories.
